Atlanta.Ferst Center for the Arts:
The Robert Ferst Center for the Arts, located in Atlanta, Georgia, is Georgia Tech's theater and arts center and is adjacent to DramaTech, the student-run theater. It contains a 1,155-seat auditorium that features a proscenium stage, orchestra pit, and theatrical lighting and sound systems.
The Center also features visual arts galleries for changing exhibits of contemporary art and photography.
